name: Savage Seasons
description:
Windows download also available (see below).

The Ancients destroyed their world with their Science. Now seasons mutate life beyond recognition. In this old-school first-person dungeon crawler, assemble a party of mutants to find the three keys that will stop the long-dead Ancients' Machine and end the Savage Seasons.

Includes a level editor. Windows version required to save levels.

Made for Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2019.

Source on GitHub: https://github.com/tonyli99/ShenaniJam2019_SavageSeasons

Theme: DNA Chaos

Achievements: 

  • Tis the Season
  • Levelhead
  • Totally Ethical Surprise Mechanics
  • Maverick

After a number of turns, or randomly from loot boxes, a season change will merge the first two characters into a single character with a mix of traits from both. Loot boxes are also the only way to find the 3 keys required to complete the main quest.
